title: New: Mona Vale – Not Given Up
content:
This debut single from Mona Vale aka multi-instrumentalist Jamie Hoddle is pure vibes.

Merging super slick almost Caribou-esque production with Bon Iver inspired vocals, it’s gorgeously ethereal and a truly immersive listen. Check out Not Given Up below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
